author: cstamas
msg: o Added async warm-up and reader reopens
o Moved critical and private code into Default context (was in IndexUtils for some reason)
o removed redundant calls (commit + optimize) since optimize does commit too
o Made tests pass again (by setting context to blocking behavior), since they were failing on async reopens (they tested too "early", before bottleWarmer did it's job and got stale reader data)

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2971, QPID-2972, QPID-2973: update system test to perform additional verification of the DLQ'd messages

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2974: add a specfic test where the DLQ prop isnt specified, splitting out PriorityQueue creation to its own test

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2973: create the StoreContext upfront for one-time use at later points, instead of creating them as required. Remove discarded message tag from the unacked map instead of allowing it to remain until the map is later cleared

author: sfermigier
msg: Cleanup and format a few files.
